org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils
Class PolynomCalculationUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils.PolynomCalculationUtils

public final class PolynomCalculationUtils
extends Object

Utility class that implements common polynom calculations such as finding the roots of polynoms of degree 2 or 3.
